awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Jerry Ryan is wandering aimlessly around New York, having given up his law career in Nebraska when his wife asked for a divorce. He meets up with Gittel Mosca, an impoverished dancer from Greenwich Village, and the two try to straighten out their lives together.

title: Two for the Seesaw
